Play 64 voices for your listening pleasure.

Purpose: to verify full polyphony.

Author: Robert Marsanyi, Phil Burk Copyright 2002-5 Mobileer

Load a song, play it multiple times (tearing down the song player between iterations), check that all memory is returned.

0 if test is successful, non-0 otherwise.
